title: Speficic Purposes
subtitle: Business
descriptions: Lesson 1 • Talking About a New Project
lessonTitle: Lesson 1 • Talking About a New Project
lessonDescription: Carl, Greg, and Anne work for WaterSonic Corporation. Recently, the company has come up with an idea for a new electric toothbrush.

paragraphs.speaker: Carl:
paragraphs.text: I think we've come up with a winner.

paragraphs.speaker: Anne:
paragraphs.text: I agree. The new Brush-o-matic should be a blockbuster!

paragraphs.speaker: Carl:
paragraphs.text: Our designers have already made up some prototypes. The toothbrushes have a tooth-whitening attachment and many other bells and whistles.

paragraphs.speaker: Greg:
paragraphs.text: We should fast track this project. Let's try to launch it in time for the holiday season.

paragraphs.speaker: Anne:
paragraphs.text: This will be a great stocking stuffer!

paragraphs.speaker: Carl:
paragraphs.text: We definitely need a big win for the holidays.

paragraphs.speaker: Anne:
paragraphs.text: This is a great idea. We're going to make a killing.

paragraphs.speaker: Greg:
paragraphs.text: Let's not talk about this project to anybody who doesn't need to know. We'll keep it under wraps.

paragraphs.speaker: Carl:
paragraphs.text: I agree. Mum's the word. We don't want any of our competitors to get wind of the idea and rip it off.

paragraphs.speaker: Anne:
paragraphs.text: Right. Let's meet again on Monday morning and discuss our game plan for getting this project off the ground!
